channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: McDonald’s may bring its 1,057-calorie Big Arch to America soon. Why it could be a billion-dollar burger.
item.description: McDonald’s is just one of a number of fast-food and fast-casual chains going the plus-size route with their burgers.

item.title: Here’s what happens to your HSA when you go on Medicare — and how to keep up the tax savings
item.description: Tax planning becomes a priority if you’re still working and can no longer fund an HSA.

item.title: These home buyers are suing one of the biggest mortgage lenders in America. Why you should pay attention.
item.description: A class-action lawsuit against mortgage-lending giant Rocket Companies accuses the company of illegally steering homebuyers toward using their service...

item.title: A luxury ‘phobia’ is gripping these consumers. It’s a red flag for brands like Chanel and Gucci.
item.description: In China, conspicuous consumption is out, and “local heroes” are in.

item.title: The best investors avoid ‘revenge trading’ and other raw emotions. Here’s how you can too.
item.description: It’s not stock charts; it’s your mindset. This veteran trader’s insider tips can sharpen your skills.

item.title: Activist Dan Loeb dusts off his poison pen as he seeks a board refresh at CoStar Group
item.description: Investors are seeing shades of yesteryear's Dan Loeb in a letter he recently wrote to the CoStar board.

item.title: Software shares are among the most oversold stocks in the S&P 500
item.description: Software giants such as Intuit and Palantir were among this week's most oversold stocks. Memory stocks topped CNBC's screen of overbought names.

item.title: Trump finally makes his Fed chair pick — what Kevin Warsh means for investors
item.description: Investors see the former Fed governor as a credible steward of monetary policy despite expectations he may push for lower rates.

item.title: Buy gold and sell silver as the metals' run to record unwinds, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth looks at the silver/gold ratio.

item.title: Palantir and these other stocks reporting next week have earnings momentum at their back
item.description: The list of companies where analysts have lately lifted estimates includes Ralph Lauren and Palantir.
